lead_paragraph: Matt Ridley climbed his ladder, scrawled a tribute to his deceased loved ones and high fived his mom when his feet hit the sidewalk.

headline.print_headline: Cubs Fans Sign 'Friendly Chalkboard' on Wrigley Walls
